value.title: Download your reports from the Power Bi service (powerbi.com) - Power BI Tips & Tricks #19
value.excerpt: In this video I will show you Microsoft's latest functionality added to the Power BI service (Powerbi.com).  This update was released last week (2016-Nov) and it allows you and your team to download the power bi reports from the service. I also explain why the functionality is not always enabled.   Looking

value.title: Monitor usage with Power BI audit logs
value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI. This tool is perfect for troubleshoot and to help you document what is being done in Power BI and use it to comply with laws like GDPR.  To turn it on, you need an E3 or E5 office 365 license. value.title: Power BI Tips & Tricks #07: Change multiple hardcoded path sources at once in Power BI

I am going to show you an easy way to solve this.  Here you can download the pbix file: http://trantor.synology.me:5000/fbsharing/nc9kfXTw

value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible
